titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Vail Brothers Photograph Albums, approximately 1880-1890
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Laura Streett

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Laura Streett, 2010

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: This collection consists of two large photograph albums of images of Poughkeepsie, including Vassar College.

bioghist.head: Administrative History
bioghist.p: The Vail Brothers Poughkeepsie photography studio appears to have been in business for at least the last two decades of the 19th century. The brothers were Alonzo H. Vail (1855-1929) and J. Watson Vail (1849-1922).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of two large photograph albums. One includes photographs of Vassar College and appears to be circa 1889. The second album also includes images of Vassar (many of them duplicates from the first album, but with some additions); however, the bulk of the second album consists of images of Poughkeepsie. Of special note are a series of photos of the construction of the Poughkeepsie Railroad Bridge, ca. 1887-1888.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: The second album was once owned my Mrs. John E. Phillps, Sr.

altformavail.head: Other Formats
altformavail.p: Some of the Vassar photos have been digitized and are available on the Images of Early Vassar web site.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Vail Brothers Photograph Albums, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

dsc.head: Container List
dsc.p: There is no container list currently available for this collection.
